plot: A young Polish immigrant deliberates between a life of struggle in the US and a return home with unfulfilled notions of success.
title: American Dreamer
plot_es: A young Polish immigrant deliberates between a life of struggle in the US and a return home with unfulfilled notions of success.
plot_en: A young Polish immigrant deliberates between a life of struggle in the US and a return home with unfulfilled notions of success.
